mapper.sql: id, type, season2, season3, season4, name, sex, phone_staff_id, receiver_staff_id,receiver_staff_name, business_phone, phone, REPLACE(phone, SUBSTR(phone,4,4), '****') phoneHidden, visit_date,visit_count as visitCount, area, address, phone2, REPLACE(phone2, SUBSTR(phone2,4,4), '****') phone2Hidden, relation_id, qq, msn, site, id_card,receiver_staff_date, product, transaction_amount, call_dates,gift,recent_visit_date, recent_export_date, recent_import_date, blacklist_flag, update_date, update_flag

select
distinct
,visit_count as visitCount ,phone_staff_name as phoneStaffName from customer_info
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.sql: ci.id, ci.type, ci.season2, ci.season3, ci.season4, ci.name, ci.sex, ci.address, ci.phone_staff_id, ei.name as phone_staff_name, ci.receiver_staff_id, ci.business_phone, ci.phone, REPLACE(phone, SUBSTR(phone,4,4), '****') phoneHidden, ci.visit_date, ci.area, ci.phone2, ci.relation_id, ci.qq, ci.msn, ci.site, ci.id_card, ci.product, ci.transaction_amount, ci.recent_visit_date, ci.recent_export_date, ci.call_dates, ci.blacklist_flag, ci.update_date, ci.update_flag,a.recent_create_date, a.pay_price

update customer_info set recent_export_date = now() where id in
#{customer.id}
mapper.insert: insert into customer_info ( id,type,season2,season3,season4, name,sex,phone_staff_id,phone_staff_name,receiver_staff_name,gift, business_phone,phone, receiver_staff_date, area,update_date, phone2,relation_id,qq,msn, site,id_card,product,transaction_amount, recent_import_date ) values ( rand_string(16), #{p0}, #{p1}, #{p2}, #{p3}, #{p4}, '', (select a.id from employee_info a where a.name=#{p5} limit 1),#{p5}, #{p6}, #{p7}, #{p8}, #{p9}, #{p10}, #{p11}, case when #{p12} = '' then null else DATE_FORMAT(#{p12},'%Y-%m-%d') end, #{p13}, #{p14}, #{p15}, #{p16}, #{p17},#{p18},#{p19}, case when #{p20} = '' then null else #{p20} end, now() ) on duplicate key update recent_import_date = now(), type = (case when type < #{p0} then #{p0} else type end), update_date = (case when #{p12} = '' then null else DATE_FORMAT(#{p12},'%Y-%m-%d') end), phone_staff_id = (select a.id from employee_info a where a.name=#{p5} limit 1), phone_staff_name = #{p5}, receiver_staff_name = #{p6}, receiver_staff_date = #{p10}, product = #{p19}, transaction_amount = #{p20}, visit_count = (case when type = 1 then visit_count + 1 else visit_count end), gift = #{p7}

insert into customer_info ( id,type,season2,season3,season4, name,sex,phone_staff_id,phone_staff_name,receiver_staff_name,gift, business_phone,phone, receiver_staff_date, area,update_date, phone2,relation_id,qq,msn, site,id_card,product,transaction_amount, recent_import_date ) values ( rand_string(16), #{p0}, #{p1}, #{p2}, #{p3}, #{p4}, '', (select a.id from employee_info a where a.name=#{p5} limit 1),#{p5}, #{p6}, #{p7}, #{p8}, #{p9}, #{p10}, #{p11}, case when #{p12} = '' then null else DATE_FORMAT(#{p12},'%Y-%m-%d') end, #{p13}, #{p14}, #{p15}, #{p16}, #{p17},#{p18},#{p19}, case when #{p20} = '' then null else #{p20} end, now() ) on duplicate key update recent_import_date = now(), type = (case when type < #{p0} then #{p0} else type end), update_date = (case when #{p12} = '' then null else DATE_FORMAT(#{p12},'%Y-%m-%d') end), phone_staff_id = (select a.id from employee_info a where a.name=#{p5} limit 1), phone_staff_name = (case when #{p5} = '' then '' else concat(phone_staff_name, '\\n', #{p5}) end), receiver_staff_name = concat(receiver_staff_name, '\\n', #{p6}), receiver_staff_date = concat(receiver_staff_date, '\\n', #{p10}), product = concat(product, '\\n', #{p19}), transaction_amount = (case when #{p20} != '' then transaction_amount + #{p20} else transaction_amount end), visit_count = (case when type = 1 then visit_count + 1 else visit_count end), gift = concat(gift, '\\n', #{p7})
mapper.update: update customer_info set phone_staff_id = #{p0} where phone = #{p1}
